dublinCore.title: 113 HR 1961 IH: To amend title 46, United States Code, to extend the exemption from the fire-retardant materials construction requirement for vessels operating within the Boundary Line.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Chabot (for himself, Mr. Clay, Mr. Wenstrup, and Mr. Massie) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to extend the exemption from the fire-retardant materials construction requirement for vessels operating within the Boundary Line.

section.text: Section 3503(a) of title 46, United States Code, is amended by striking 2008 and inserting 2028.
